content:
Synthesis of [Co(H 2 O) 4 (CH 3 CN) 2 ][Co(muia)(H 2 O) 2 ] 2 , 1. To H3muia (64 mg, 0.2 mmol) in 0.1 M KOH (4 mL), Co(CH3COO)2·4H2O (50 mg, 0.2 mmol) in MeOH (2 mL) was added and stirred for 15 min. Acetonitrile (15 mL) was layered on the resulting orange clear solution. Orange rod crystals were obtained after 1 week. Alternatively, single crystals of 1 can be obtained as a single product when acetonitrile is layered as a buffer layer between the solution of H3muia and Co(CH3COO)2·4H2O. Compound 1 loses solvent upon decantion from the mother liquor. Elemental analysis and TGA analysis was done on the air-dried sample, and it was found that one acetonitrile solvent molecule is lost during the analysis. Yield:  25 mg (69%). ESI-MS 377.3 [CoC15H12NO7]-. Anal. Calcd. for dehydrated compound C32H43N3O22Co3:  C, 38.49; H, 4.34; N, 4.21. Found:  C, 38.47; H, 4.37; N, 4.95. IR (KBr, cm-1):  υ(free OH) 3527; υ(OH) 3308; υas (COO - ) 1685; υas (COO - ) 1587; υs (COO - ) 1388. Calcd. TG weight loss of dehydrated compound 18.5%; found 18.9%. UV−vis (λmax (nm), ε (M-1 cm-1)):  (methanol) LMCT, 353(5680), d−d transition, 518(140); (nujol mull) LMCT, 370 nm.

Synthesis of [Co(H 2 O) 6 ][Co 2 (muia) 2 (H 2 O) 2 ]·2CH 3 CN, 2. When the above solution was left for 2 weeks, red cubic crystals of 2 were obtained. Yield:  8 mg (4%). ESI-MS 377.1 [CoC15H12NO7]-. Anal. Calcd. for C34H46N4O22Co3:  C, 39.28; H, 4.46; N, 4.93. Found:  C, 38.49; H, 4.34; N, 4.21. IR (KBr, cm-1):  υ(free OH) 3609; υ(OH) 3414; υas (COO - ) 1686; υas (COO - ) 1590; υs (COO - ) 1389. Calcd. TG weight loss for all solvent molecules 21.8%; found 20.8%. UV−vis (λmax (nm), ε (M-1 cm-1)):  (methanol) LMCT, 353(30155), d−d transition, 532(230); (nujol mull) LMCT, 366 nm.

Synthesis of [{Co(H 2 O) 4 }{Co 2 (muia) 2 (H 2 O) 2 }]·11H 2 O, 3. Co(CH3COO)2·4H2O (100.0 mg, 0.4 mmol) in EtOH (2 mL) was layered on the solution of H3muia (64 mg, 0.2 mmol) in 0.1 M KOH (4 mL). Orange block crystals were obtained after 5 days. Yield:  64 mg (17%). ESI-MS 377.2 [CoC15H12NO7]-. Anal. Calcd. for C30H40N2O22Co3:  C, 37.63; H, 4.21; N, 2.93. Found:  C, 37.57; H, 4.17; N, 2.90. Only two lattice water and six coordinated water are retained in the air-dried sample. IR (KBr, cm-1):  υ(free OH) 3573; υ(OH) 3402; υas (COO - ) 1647; υas (COO - ) 1589; υs (COO - ) 1395. Calcd. TG weight loss of six coordinated water molecules 11.7%; found 12.1%. UV−vis (λmax (nm), ε (M-1 cm-1)):  (methanol) LMCT, 354(28630), d−d transition, 521(210); (nujol mull) LMCT, 370 nm.
